page.title: 17Court Gardens Bungalows
page.content: There are 8 senior citizen bungalows behind Westbury Court Home for the Elderly. In 1985 there are 6 widows, a spinster and a married couple. The bungalows comprise an entrance porch with a built in shed, hall, lounge, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom, gas centrally heated. There is a bell system in the bedroom and bathroom which communicates with the Home if necessary. Four bungalows have gardens with the churchyard wall at the bottom 2 abut the Gardens Car Park and the remaining 2 have borders of flowers around their bungalows. The seat on the lawn affords rest for the residents of the Home who are able to go out walking. All properties are administered by the Council and are only let to the over 60's.
